name: Laura Duffy
biography:
Laura Duffy is a visual artist based in Te Whanganui-A-Tara (Wellington), Aotearoa. Duffyâ€™s visual practice works with experimental video and low-fi animation. She is interested in exploring queer pleasure or joy derived from failure, error and disgust.  Laura Duffy holds a Bachelor of Fine Arts with First Class Honours from Whiti O Rehua, Massey University. Since graduating she has worked on projects with multiple artist-run spaces and institutions throughout Aotearoa as well Australia, China and Japan. Previously, Laura has been a facilitator of artist-run initiative MEANWHILE (2017-2019). Laura is currently featured on Circuit Artist Film and Video Aotearoa and RM's Women's Moving Image Archive.

[Sourced from artist website: https://lauraduffy.myportfolio.com/bio 27 Oct 2021]
